text: Hey Twitter, have you heard about the 2023-2024 U.S. Flu Season? 🤧‍♂️💉 The preliminary in-season burden estimates are out and they're updated weekly! 📊🚨 Compared to previous flu seasons, the current season's estimated hospitalizations are 😱.
